item.title: A Time for Entrepreneurs
item.description: The concept of job security has become almost contradictory in recent times. It’s rare to find guaranteed employment, and even the usual promises of job stability for good performance are fading. We’ve faced recessions before, but this one is so significant that it might earn a name like “The Great Recession,” reminiscent of the depression our parents and grandparents endured. Facing a severe economic downturn is never positive. Job losses without readily available replacements are becoming a harsh reality for many.
